posts.post_content:
I am looking for a presentable T206 Addie Joss pitching pose, either raw or graded 1-2 range.  

Open to any of the various backs.

Please email me if you are looking to sell.

Thanks,
Tyler

[url]tilercox@aol.com[/url]

I am still interested in other backs for this card.  Other than Tolstoi or Polar Bear.

Major thanks to David L. for a great deal.  He sold me the card for less than my offer...then shipped same day with delivery confirmation.  True gentleman.

Let me know if there are any other low grade Joss pitching pose out there for sale.

Thanks,

Tyler
